summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing setting a time to talk. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which is intended for his use.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley to arrange a conversation, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: It contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The email discusses setting a time for a conversation between Epstein and Staley.
